name: pictorially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the form of a picture or photograph; in a way that relates to pictures or photographs: The vast bronze doors pictorially chart the island's history. It's one of the most pictorially spectacular films we'll see all year. See
pictorial
More examplesFewer examplesThe lives and time of those early lifeboat crews are commemorated pictorially in a permanent display.Post-Impressionism borrowed pictorially from Japanese prints.Data are often expressed pictorially in a way that makes them visually richer than just charts or graphs.
